title: Diffusion tensor imaging data — dti
text: Fractional anisotropy (FA) tract profiles corpus callosum (cca) right corticospinal tract (rcst). Accompanying tract profiles subject ID numbers, visit number, total number scans, multiple sclerosis case status Paced Auditory Serial Addition Test (pasat) score. Data also include refund package another format.

title: Diffusion tensor imaging data — dti
text: tibble 382 rows 6 variables: id Subject ID visit visit number sex sex subject case multiple sclerosis case status cca fractional anisotropy (FA) tract profile corpus callosum rcst fractional anisotropy (FA) tract profile right corticospinal tract
